name: Warehouse Simulator
description:
In Warehouse Simulator you will be able to manage your own warehouse by receiving and delivering orders with your own forklift. Become an expert handling the forklift and use it to do different tasks with different types of pallets and loads. Do missions transporting goods to different destinations with your truck. Upgrade your warehouse and start receiving more orders.

Features:

- Manage your own warehouse. Improve your own warehouse, so you can receive more orders and earn more money and experience.

- Learn to drive a realistic forklift and do different tasks with it.

- Do missions transporting different goods with your truck. You will visit different destinations depending on the goods.
